dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is a broad term and has recently become a household term in the medical field However there are many interpretations as to what the term telemedicine means There are many facets to telemedicine and here we describe all of the elements of telemedicine a glossary of terms and how they relate to pediatric surgery
European journal of pediatric surgery : official journal of Austrian Association of Pediatric Surgery ... [et al] = Zeitschrift f√ºr Kinderchirurgie
What is "telemedicine" and what does it mean for a pediatric surgeon?
